ValidationRule.description: Requiring the Client Amendment to be completed before moving to Compliance Check
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.Org_Wide_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c), ISPICKVAL(Client_Amendment__c, ""), OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , "Compliance Check"), ISPICKVAL(Status , "Compliance Review and Doc Gen"), AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Closed_Reason__c , "Onboarded") ) ), OR( $RecordType.Name = "Yearly Check", $RecordType.Name = "Adhoc Check", $RecordType.Name = "Service Line" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a value for the Client Amendment field before moving the Case to Compliance Check, Compliance Review and Doc Gen, or Closed with Close Reason = Onboarded. This applies to Yearly Check, Adhoc Check, and Service Line record types.
